award_title: HCC: Medium: Language-guided Haptic Texture Modeling and Signal Generation
subject: Your lab's haptic authoring tools outliving the paper
body:
Shipping ML models + haptic APIs so other labs can actually use them is brutalâ€”especially when you want your tools to reach designers, not just researchers who can debug dependency hell.

We built Ouro to make computational tools discoverable, reusable, and citable, so your students' authoring frameworks become infrastructure other labs build on (with their names attached).

Worth a quick chat? I know it's a busy time of year.

Best,

Matt Moderwell
https://ouro.foundation
